name: 3D JESSE GAME
description:
xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo

3D Jesse Game is a short adventure in honour of Jesse's birthday.

Must be played in full screen or yr house might burn down.

CONTROLS~~~~~~~~~~

Arrow keys to move

Space to jump

"C" to crouch

ESC to quit

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

music by adkehn

sound effects from earthworm jim and youtubes

xoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxoxo
